# isRepresentedElement

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether this element is in the text layout.

## Declaration

```swift
var isRepresentedElement: Bool { get }
```

## Accessing text elements

- **parent**: A value that represents the parent element if this text element is a child of an enclosing element.
- **childElements**: An array of zero or more child text elements.
